com.pilot.jword.writer
Class ODFWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.pilot.jword.writer.ODFWriter

public class ODFWriter
extends java.lang.Object

ODF Writer implementation. Creates a content.xml, styles.xml and other files for images inside a single zip file.
